Title: WPF Tree Debugger Visualizer
Description: A debugger visualizer to view the Windows Presentation Foundation logical and visual tree of dependency objects.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A debugger visualizer to view the Windows Presentation Foundation logical and visual tree of dependency objects.

WPF Element Tree

For a more in-depth overview of the Element Tree in WPF I suggest you take a look at the following article http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms753391.aspx.
